channel.title: Funorb is not abandoned
channel.description:
not sure how many people still play or follow funorb anymore but jagex has updated some.
it appears all the games have a new loading screen.
all certificates were updated
and even a new game. http://mggameserver4.funorb.com/g=confined/game.ws?js=1
arcanists seems to be growing in size steadily..
thoughts?

item.title: Funorb is not abandoned
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Running it through my deobber took like an hour for some reason, and my decompiler still couldn’t do all of the methods. However for the most part it worked fine and if you spent an hour or two just removing some erroneous code that causes errors you could get the loader working and then move forward.

http://puu.sh/dhkSW/b69b9b05b7.rar

Also it used the wrong encoding so any strings are incorrect. You could probably fix that too.

Read full topic

item.title: Funorb is not abandoned
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

makes sense.

i just think its a great gaming concept. and if given the ability to make custom spell books/avatars/spell effects/minions/armageddons etc the game would be super intense…

Read full topic

item.title: Funorb is not abandoned
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

not really going to be able to the server sends things like projected rotation distance speed whatever but it does not say how its calculated you would never be able to make an “exact” clone simply for this fact but it would still be fun if your spells worked differently

Read full topic

item.title: Funorb is not abandoned
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:37, topic:548209”]I expect its a mixture of both, for example I remember you could sometimes cast the magma spell it would blow up make a bunch of craters but then when your turn ended you would see them shift slightly clearly where the server sent corrected data to the client.[/quote]so i assume we would need to gather this data from the server?

if this is the case, and someone wants to point me the correct direction i could begin looking into it.

i attempted to make a clone of arc with a crappy youtube 2d game tutorial lol - so i have a good collection of the images… but if people gather up motivation for this, the cache will be open for everyone’s eyes

Read full topic

item.title: Funorb is not abandoned
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

well what would be required to find motivation to work on this further?

people say the game is dead - because nobody is wanting to pay for a game that isnt manged/updated/filled with hackers.

however, a private server could (and i assume it would) be instantly popular - also think of the amount of customizations you could do!

quick question too- if anyone has factual evidence/knowledge would be great, if not - what you expect: would all the physics of the spells be in the client ? or if we did develop a working ‘server’ would that data all need to be manually entered (or dumped from official servers) such as base speed / weight(? i know nothing about physics but how the angle of trijectory / speed / distance is determined) etc

because i know you can do the extended bar/guideline for further spells, or you can do the speedhacks for super crazy effects…

also - the random map generation - how exactly does that work? and is it server/client sided?

Read full topic

item.title: Funorb is not abandoned
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:33, topic:548209”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=667115.msg4461458#msg4461458 date=1417735229]
The spells didn’t work because of some networking encryption (couldnt PM/talk in the actual chat either, etc). If I was to write a server for it it would have worked fine, I just didn’t want to put the time in for that.
[/quote]
upload what you have I have some free time coming up provide cache as well.[/quote]AHHHHHHHHHHHHH

Like I said 500000 times I dont have what I had before. However I just ran the new client through a deobber I’ve never used before, if it worked out decently I’ll upload it.

Read full topic

item.title: Funorb is not abandoned
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:

Davidi2:

The spells didn’t work because of some networking encryption (couldnt PM/talk in the actual chat either, etc). If I was to write a server for it it would have worked fine, I just didn’t want to put the time in for that.

upload what you have I have some free time coming up provide cache as well.

also ALL THE LINKS CONTAINED IN THESE POSTS ARE LONG DEAD!:

item.title: Funorb is not abandoned
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Ashi, post:25, topic:548209”]I’m pretty sure Enigma already did this?[/quote]enigma never successfully achieved his goals and moved back into hacking for $ when arc had the massive dead-zone.

david gave up after being frustrated from the spells not working/lack of motivation to work on a dead game.

[quote=“Davidi2, post:26, topic:548209”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=667115.msg4461406#msg4461406 date=1417718656]
ashi I highly doubt you’ve accomplished something that David, Silab, Taharok, Enigma(isnt as smart but understood a lot tbh), and all the other kids over on r-s that have tried to do and failed.

no offense, but if you are smart enough to have done it in the past (and assuming you’ve learned more since then) it should be no feat to do it again. so I challenge you to go make a working deob/simple login server. or simply get the cache format
[/quote]I never tried to make a server for it. I tried to deob the client and get it to log into the game and succeeded.[/quote]>non working spells< but meh

i really feel as if someone with the knowledge worked on deobing (or a few people to make things faster) this, and a ‘arcanists winterlove’ is created - we could grow a new type of playerbase.

i attempted to do it myself and couldnt understand all the errors in the client after i ran the deobber lol

Read full topic
